com.invisiblecollector

Class IcApiFacade

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.invisiblecollector.IcApiFacade

  • public class IcApiFacade
extends java.lang.Object
    A Thread-Safe and Immutable Container for the various api Invisible Collector operations.

    Used to split the API surface area along logical divisions.

    Use this as the entry point into the Library.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      IcApiFacade(com.invisiblecollector.connection.ApiRequestFacade apiFacade, com.invisiblecollector.model.json.JsonModelFacade jsonFacade)

      IcApiFacade(java.lang.String apiToken)
      Creates an object with the default hostname (https://api.invisiblecollector.com).
      IcApiFacade(java.lang.String apiToken, java.net.URI baseUrl)
      Creates an object with a custom hostname or base path.

                   java.net.URI baseUrl)
        Creates an object with a custom hostname or base path.
        Parameters:
        apiToken - the company's Api Token
        baseUrl - the hostname, scheme and optionally base path for the connection

      • requestCompanyInfo

        public Company requestCompanyInfo()
                           throws IcException
        Request the company info from the database.
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info.
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general exception

      • setCompanyNotifications

        public Company setCompanyNotifications(boolean enableNotifications)
                                throws IcException
        Enable or disable notifications for the company's customer.
        Parameters:
        enableNotifications - true: enable notifications, false: disable notifications
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info.
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general exception

      • updateCompanyInfo

        public Company updateCompanyInfo(Company companyInfo)
                          throws IcException
        Update company info.

        You should use requestCompanyInfo() before using this method to request company info since the name and vatNumber mandatory company fields are needed for validation and consistency purposes.

        Parameters:
        companyInfo - the company info. name and vatNumber are mandatory attributes.
        Returns:
        up-to-date company info
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general exception

      • registerNewCustomer

        public Customer registerNewCustomer(Customer customerInfo)
                             throws IcException,
                                    IcConflictingException
        Register a new customer in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerInfo - the object containing the customer information. Attributes name, country and vatNumber are mandatory
        Returns:
        an up to date Customer containing the customer's information
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        IcConflictingException - in case the vatNumber or externalId already exists for another customer in the database. In that case this object contains the id of the conflicting customer.
        See Also:
        registerNewCustomer(Customer)

      • requestCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> requestCustomerAttributes(java.lang.String customerId)
                                                                           throws IcException
        Get the customer attributes string map.

        Use setCustomerAttributes(String, Map) to set the attributes returned by this method.

        Parameters:
        customerId - the id of the customer (can be the id or externalId).
        Returns:
        a map containing up-to-date string:string attribute pairs which correspond to the customer.
        Throws:
        IcException - in case of any error

      • requestCustomerDebts

        public java.util.List<Debt> requestCustomerDebts(java.lang.String customerId)
                                          throws IcException
        Get the customer's debts.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id or external id of the customer
        Returns:
        the customer's up-to-date list of debts
        Throws:
        IcException - on any general error

      • requestCustomerInfo

        public Customer requestCustomerInfo(java.lang.String customerId)
                             throws IcException
        Get customer info from the database.
        Parameters:
        customerId - the id or externalId of the customer.
        Returns:
        the up-to-date customer info
        Throws:
        IcException - any general error

      • setCustomerAttributes

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> setCustomerAttributes(java.lang.String customerId,
                                                                              java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> attributes)
                                                                       throws IcException
        Set the customer's string map attributes.

        Use requestCustomerAttributes(String)

        Parameters:
        customerId - the id or externalId of the customer.
        attributes - the map with the attributes to set. Duplicate values in the database are updated, while pre-existing values in the database are unaffected.
        Returns:
        a map containing up-to-date string:string attribute pairs which correspond to the customer.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general error

      • updateCustomerInfo

        public Customer updateCustomerInfo(Customer customerInfo)
                            throws IcException
        Update the customer's info in the database.
        Parameters:
        customerInfo - the customer info. Must contain as well an id or externalId that indicates the customer to update. The country attribute is mandatory.
        Returns:
        the up-to-date customer info.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        See Also:
        updateCustomerInfo(Customer)

      • registerNewDebt

        public Debt registerNewDebt(Debt debtInfo)
                     throws IcException
        Register a new debt related to a customer.
        Parameters:
        debtInfo - the debt information to register. The number, customerId, type, date and dueDate are mandatory attributes. If the model contains items they must contain the name attribute.
        Returns:
        an up-to-date object with the debt information.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
        See Also:
        registerNewDebt(Debt)

      • requestDebtInfo

        public Debt requestDebtInfo(java.lang.String debtId)
                     throws IcException
        Request debt information from the database.
        Parameters:
        debtId - the id of the debt whose information is requested.
        Returns:
        up-to-date debt information.
        Throws:
        IcException - any general exception
